Package com.w10.risk_game.controllers

Class MapEditorController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.w10.risk_game.controllers.MapEditorController
  • public class MapEditorController
extends Object
    The MapEditorController class is responsible for managing the game map, players, issuing orders, executing orders and their interactions in a game.
    Author:
    Omnia Alam

    • Method Detail

      • loadMap

        public void loadMap​(String p_filePath)
        The function "loadMap" loads a map file, creates a game map object, and checks if the map is valid.
        Parameters:
        p_filePath - The parameter `p_filePath` is a String that represents the full path of the file from which the map will be loaded.

      • showMap

        public void showMap​(boolean p_showArmies)
        The function displays the game map, showing armies if specified.
        Parameters:
        p_showArmies - A boolean value indicating whether or not to display the armies on the map. If p_showArmies is true, the armies will be displayed on the map. If p_showArmies is false, the armies will not be displayed on the map.

      • getGameMap

        public GameMap getGameMap()
        The function returns the game map.
        Returns:
        The method is returning an object of type GameMap.

      • editMap

        public boolean editMap​(String p_mapFilePath)
        The function `editMap` checks if a map file exists, loads it if it does, creates a new file if it doesn't, and returns a boolean indicating success or failure.
        Parameters:
        p_mapFilePath - The parameter `p_mapFileName` is a String that represents the file name or path of the map file that needs to be edited.
        Returns:
        The method is returning a boolean value.

      • addContinent

        public void addContinent​(String p_continentName,
                         int p_bonus)
        The function adds a continent to a map editor and prints the output.
        Parameters:
        p_continentName - The parameter "p_continentName" is a String that represents the name of the continent that you want to add.
        p_bonus - The p_bonus parameter is an integer that represents the bonus for each continent.

      • addCountry

        public void addCountry​(int p_countryId,
                       String p_countryName,
                       String p_continentName)
        The function adds a country to a map editor and prints the output.
        Parameters:
        p_countryId - The p_countryId parameter is an integer that represents the unique identifier for the country being added.
        p_countryName - The parameter "p_countryName" is a String that represents the name of the country that you want to add.
        p_continentName - The p_continentName parameter is an integer that represents the ID of the continent to which the country belongs.

      • removeContinent

        public void removeContinent​(String p_continentName)
        The function removes a continent from a map in a game editor.
        Parameters:
        p_continentName - The parameter "p_continentId" is an integer that represents the ID of the continent that needs to be removed.

      • removeCountry

        public void removeCountry​(int p_countryId)
        The function removes a country from the map editor and logs the output or an error message if an exception occurs.
        Parameters:
        p_countryId - The parameter "p_countryId" is an integer that represents the ID of the country that needs to be removed.

      • addNeighbor

        public void addNeighbor​(int p_countryId,
                        int p_neighbourCountryId)
        The function adds a neighbor country to a given country in a map editor.
        Parameters:
        p_countryId - The p_countryId parameter represents the ID of the country to which you want to add a neighbor.
        p_neighbourCountryId - The parameter "p_neighbourCountryId" represents the ID of the neighboring country that you want to add to the country with the ID "p_countryId".

      • removeNeighbor

        public void removeNeighbor​(int p_countryId,
                           int p_neighborCountryId)
        The function removes a neighbor country from a given country in a map editor.
        Parameters:
        p_countryId - The p_countryId parameter represents the ID of the country from which you want to remove a neighbor.
        p_neighborCountryId - The parameter "p_neighborCountryId" represents the ID of the neighbor country that you want to remove from the country with ID "p_countryId".

      • checkIfMapIsValid

        public boolean checkIfMapIsValid()
        The function checks if a game map is valid and prints a corresponding message.
        Returns:
        a boolean value indicate if the game map is valid

      • saveMap

        public void saveMap​(String p_mapFilePath,
                    String p_mapType)
        The function saves the game map to a file if it is valid, otherwise it prints an error message.
        Parameters:
        p_mapFilePath - The full path of the file where the map will be saved.
        p_mapType - The type of the map to save. 1 for Domination, 2 for Conquest.

      • readMapFile

        private GameMap readMapFile​(String p_mapFilePath)
        The function reads a map file and determines which map reader to use based on the file contents, then returns the loaded game map.
        Parameters:
        p_mapFilePath - The file path of the map file that needs to be read.
        Returns:
        The method returns a GameMap object.

      • setGameMap

        public void setGameMap​(GameMap d_gameMap)
        The function sets the game map.
        Parameters:
        d_gameMap - The game map to set.
